data.title: BACKEND .NET DEVELOPER
data.content:
Groove Technology is a cutting-edge software services provider specializing in custom software systems and solutions. We seek to attract and retain the smartest and most capable staff in and around Ho Chi Minh City to offer the highest level of service to our customers from Asia, Australia, and Europe.

We are a dynamic, process-oriented company with a keen focus on high-quality delivery and continuous improvement. We are seeking open-minded, creative, pro-active professionals who are capable of thinking outside of the box and who are comfortable with sharing their ideas.

benefits.value: 13th month salary and 14 annual leave.
Medical and Accident Insurance program.
International, dynamic, friendly working environment.
Clear and stable career growth.
Many opportunities for personal and professional development.
Professional training.
Company trip and regular team building events, sport activities…

value: To be successful in this role you must have:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent work experience.
Have 2+ years of work experience as an Engineer delivering projects using Microsoft Stack (C#).
Have a strong understanding of object-oriented programming.
Have strong experience in developing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and functions.
Have good experience in performance tuning strategies.
Have knowledge of software development and user interface web applications.
Have experience with source control such as TFS / SVN / GIT.
Clear, concise communication along with logical/analytical skills.
Have a competent judgment to inform problems superiors on time.
Have experience managing timelines and task priority.
The following is considered highly advantageous:
Strong in communicating in English.
Logistics domain experience.

data.title: Senior Officer DevOps Engineering
data.content:
• Design, develop & operate all related platforms in Tech Platform department (E.g: container platform, CI/CD platform, secret management platform, etc…) to ensure smooth & secure operation of said systems.
  • Collaborate with the team to achieve the success metrics reliably and consistently post-launch & throughout life-cycle of the system. Provide continuous design & operation improvements in order to meet the ambitious short-term/long-term goals of the department.

company.display_name: Ngân hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng (VPBank)

benefits.value: Competitive salary and bonus package
Insurance in accordance with Labor laws + VPBank Care insurance for all employees. (insurance covered for family members for entitled employees)
Working time: from Monday to Friday & 2 Saturday mornings/month
Staff loan with special interest rates
Traing courses based on the job, Training framework/Learning RoadMap for each position
Annual leave (varied based on job grade)
Travel allowance
A dynamic and friendly working environment, full of great opportunities to develop your career and abundant interesting activities to join (Sports competitions, talent contests, teambuilding…)

value: Educational Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.
Relevant Knowledge/ Expertise:
2-3 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer or equivalent software-engineering role .
4+ years of experience in software engineering
Good in one or more coding languages, preferably Java or .NET
Experience with CI/CD workflows and tools: Jenkins, Artifactory, Nexus, CircleCI, GitLabCI, Ansible, etc.
Experience with development platforms: AWS, Azure, GCP.
Experience with containerization platforms and technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift
Experience in network, server, and application-status monitoring.
Strong automation scripting skills.
Experience in configuration management, test-driven development and release management.
Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
Good understanding of agile development and DevOps principles.
Ability to investigate and analyze information, and to draw conclusions.
Flexibility, adaptability and desire to learn new technologies.
Skills:
Strong collaboration skills, with a demonstrated ability to work well as part of the team.
Be able to catch up and manage works quickly and effectively
Be able to work independently with high pressure, good in teamwork
Careful, responsible, and secure in protecting information/data belong to Bank
Good knowledge of risk management principles, methodology and practice
Mentor and coach other devops engineers. Assigned as a buddy to support new employees according to the new recruitment needs of each period in the center
Can use English at moderate level
Relevant Experience:
Stakeholder expectation management
Risk Management
Customer Focus
Others Experience
Strong Logical Thinker and Planner
Implementation and Deliver ability

data.title: [Junior/Middle/Senior] Full-stack Developer
data.content:
Our company is seeking full time Junior, Mid and Senior Full-stack Developers with .NET C# experience in Web and Mobile application. This position will be ideally suited to a person with experience developing commercial software and is passionate about quality and standards.

You are expected to possess excellent software development life cycle knowledge and excellent communication skills in both verbal and written to liaise with stakeholders. Documentation skills would be an advantage but not mandatory.

benefits.value: 100% salary during Probation Period
Weekly budget for team buildings  (150,000 VND per week per person)
Fully sponsored onsite trip to Titan international offices (AU, Thailand, UAE, EU etc.)
Gifts on special occasions + holidays (Tet, Full-moon festival, Birthday, Christmas etc.)
Employee Referral Program
Internal events every month (Happy lunch, Milk tea Friday, etc.)
Sport Activity Funding (Football every Tuesday & Thursday)
Education Funding
Time: Mon - Fri ( 08:30 - 05: 30 )

value: Technical attributes:
Have experience (fundamental knowledge) in .Net (3.5, 4.X) development in C#
Strong technical skills in ASP.NET, Web API, MVC, or other .NET frameworks and .NET development tools.
Experience with HTML.CSS3 & JavaScript (jQuery, Knock-out, Require, AngularJS)
Experience with API integration through web services
Working experience with Microsoft SQL Server, SQL queries
Mobile application development experience (iOS, Android, Xamarin is a plus)
Ability to participate in code reviews and be able to work autonomously and as part of a team
Communication level in English (Written & Verbal)
Additional attribute (Preferred not required):
Working experience in ERP type systems, Accounting or Retail POS systems etc.
Experience with workflow based systems
Experience in Agile Development methodologies
Experience in Win forms is a big plus
Experience with Cloud Services (AWS, Azure, GCP etc.)
GPA > = 7.0 is a big plus

Benefits package: Excellent Remuneration with Incentives and Bonus policy + other benefits (premiumhealthcare insurance, days off, onsite training opportunity etc.) will be discussed during the interview.

data.title: Tiger Tribe Product Owner
data.content:
• Function/ Region: Digital & Technology (D&T)
  • (Sub)department: D&T
  • Job purpose: we have set the ambition to become the best-connected brewer; your goal is to build the Digital Products which will drive this ambition serving all internal business functions and external stakeholders.
  • Reports to: Head of Digital Products & Innovation, HEINEKEN APAC
  • Direct Reports: N/A
  • Budget: N/A

benefits.value: A diverse and open working culture, where your true identity is celebrated.
Multiple career opportunities to rotate within Functions or cross-functions.
Your wellbeing will be taken care by our Health & Safety Team since Day 1.
Be a part of our sustainability journey in Brewing the Better Vietnam.
Performance appraisal twice a year to guarantee constructive feedback
Performance bonus (estimated at least 3 months) and 13th month salary bonus
Bao Viet Insurance for employees and family
Annual leave: 18 days/year
Flexible benefit voucher
80% lunch in canteen
Annual team building, Town hall, YEP
Gift for special holidays and sponsor traveling ticket in Tet Holiday
Từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 (Sáng 8h00-12h00, Chiều 13h00-17h00)

collection_addresses.street: Vietcombank Tower, 18th & 19th floor, 05 Cong Truong Me Linh

value: Experience & profile (what & how):
What:
Education: Bachelor Degree
Work experience: at least 5 years experience in D&T or Product Ownership roles; preferably background in FMCG, Product Design and project management preferable.
Required Agile expertise: strong team skills, able to drive change across the organization and excel in agile cross-functional teams.
Required technology expertise: good understanding of design/development approaches/tooling (i.e. Mobile Dev, Figma, JIRA) and emerging technology.

Entrepreneurial spirit: able to identify innovation and sharing opportunities across HEINEKEN, able to bring in best practises from outside of HEINEKEN as well as copying best practises from around the HEINEKEN world.
Language(s): English.
How (talent criteria):
Key Leadership expectations: shape, connect, develop, deliver and be a role model of HEINEKEN behaviours.

Communication skills: be able to inspire and motivate people and take them along on a journey. Influence others by bringing new perspectives and by winning their hearts. Effectively manage relationships with stakeholders that may have different interests, backgrounds, cultures and styles.
Other skills: creative and forward thinking while having the ability to bring structure and focus.

benefits.value: Lương thực nhận khởi điểm từ $800 - 1,700/tháng tùy vào kinh nghiệm.
Tham gia các hoạt động thể thao như: bóng đá, cầu lông, billiards.
Được du lịch nghỉ dưỡng, team building ít nhất 2 lần một năm.
Thử việc chỉ 1 tháng, sau thử việc sẽ được review tăng lương.
Đánh giá tăng lương 2 lần mỗi năm, thưởng theo project, thái độ làm việc, thăng tiến nhanh.
Hỗ trợ ăn trưa.
Teamwork nhiệt tình, trẻ tuổi và tiếp cận công nghệ mới.
Thời gian làm việc hiện tại: từ 8:00 sáng đến 17:00 chiều - 8 tiếng/ngày từ Thứ 2 - thứ 6. Nếu có đăng ký làm thứ bảy sẽ được tính OT.
